title: FS: 1912 T202 McBride-Milan-Shoeless Joe Jackson SGC 3.5 SOLD
author: Moonlight Graham

posts.post_title: FS: 1912 T202 McBride-Milan-Shoeless Joe Jackson SGC 3.5 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Very nice card featuring Shoeless Joe Jackson in the center panel. Would be nice if the grading companies would put that on the label. Of course, if they did, the price would be a heck of a lot higher (LOL). The price is SOLD delivered PayPal no fees. Thanks for having a look at my sale.

Joe K
